scripts.node:clean: rm -rf node_modules && yarn cache clean && yarn install
scripts.ios:Pod:Reset: cd ios && pod deintegrate && pod setup && pod install
scripts.ios:clean: yarn node:clean &&  cd ios && rm -rf ~/Library/Caches/CocoaPods && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData/* && yarn ios:Pod:Reset
scripts.ios:bundle:assets: react-native bundle --entry-file index.js --platform ios --dev false --bundle-output ios/main.jsbundle --assets-dest ios
scripts.ios:dev-ipa-release: export ENVFILE=.env.development && yarn ios:bundle:assets && npx react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "development"
scripts.ios:prod-release: export ENVFILE=.env.production && yarn ios:bundle:assets && npx react-native run-ios --mode=Release --scheme "production"
scripts.android:bundle:assets: npx react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
scripts.android:remove:assets: rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-hdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-mdpi &&  rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/drawable-xxxhdpi && rm -rf android/app/src/main/res/raw
scripts.android:DD-apk: export ENVFILE=.env.development && yarn android:bundle:assets && yarn android:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentDebug && killall -17 java
scripts.android:DR-apk: export ENVFILE=.env.development && yarn android:bundle:assets && yarn android:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDevelopmentRelease
scripts.android:PD-apk: export ENVFILE=.env.production && yarn android:bundle:assets && yarn android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionDebug && killall -17 java
scripts.android:PR-apk: export ENVFILE=.env.production && yarn android:bundle:assets && yarn android:remove:assets cd android && ./gradlew assembleProductionRelease && killall -17 java
scripts.android:PR-Bundle: export ENVFILE=.env.production && yarn clean && yarn android:bundle:assets && yarn android:remove:assets && cd android && ./gradlew bundleProductionRelease && killall -17 java
